I"m studying your precepts–
Your word is a lamp before my feet
I have sworn, and I fully mean it:
I have been suffering so much–
Please, LORD , accept my spontaneous gifts of praise.
Though my life is constantly in danger,
Though the wicked have set a trap for me,
Your laws are my possession forever
I have decided to keep your statutes forever, every last one.
I hate fickle people,
You are my shelter and my shield–
Get away from me, you evildoers;
Sustain me according to your word so I can live!
Support me so I can be saved
You discard everyone who strays from your statutes
You dispose of all the wicked people on earth like waste–
My body shudders because I fear you;
I"ve done what is just and right.
Guarantee good things for your servant.
My eyes are worn out looking for your saving help–
Act toward your servant according to your faithful love.
I"m your servant!
It is time for the LORD to do something!
But I love your commandments
That"s why I walk straight by every single one of your precepts.
Your laws are wonderful!
Access to your words gives light,
I open my mouth up wide, panting,
Come back to me and have mercy on me;
Keep my steps steady by your word;
Redeem me from the people who oppress me
Shine your face on your servant,
Rivers of tears stream from my eyes
LORD , you are righteous,
The laws you commanded are righteous,
Anger consumes me
Your word has been tried and tested;
I"m insignificant and unpopular,
Your righteousness lasts forever!
Stress and strain have caught up with me,
Your laws are righteous forever.
I cry out with all my heart:
I cry out to you, 'Save me
I meet the predawn light and cry for help.
My eyes encounter each hour of the night
Listen to my voice, according to your faithful love.
The people who love to plot wicked schemes are nearby,
But you, LORD , are nearby too,
Long ago I learned from your laws
Look at my suffering and deliver me
Argue my case and redeem me.
Salvation is far from the wicked
You have so much compassion, LORD –
My oppressors and enemies are many,
I look on the faithless, and I am disgusted
Look at how much I love your precepts.
The first thing to know about your word is that it is true
Rulers oppress me without cause,
I"m overjoyed at your word,
I hate, I absolutely despise, what is false,
I praise you seven times a day
The people who love your Instruction enjoy peace–and lots of it.
LORD , I wait for your saving help.
I keep your laws;
I keep your precepts and your laws
Let my cry reach you, LORD ;
Let my request for grace come before you;
Let my lips overflow with praise
Let my tongue declare your word,
Let your power help me
LORD , I long for your saving help!
Let me live again so I can praise you!
I"ve wandered off like a sheep, lost.

120.verse_text: I cried out to the LORD when I was in trouble (and he answered me): and a dishonest tongue!' what more will be done to you, you dishonest tongue? because I have been an immigrant in Meshech, because I"ve made my home among Kedar"s tents. with people who hate peace. but when I speak, they are for war.
' LORD , deliver me from lying lips
What more will be given to you,
Just this: a warrior"s sharpened arrows, coupled with burning coals from a wood fire!

121.verse_text: I raise my eyes toward the mountains. Where will my help come from? the maker of heaven and earth. Your protector won"t fall asleep on the job. never sleeps or rests! the LORD is your shade right beside you. neither will the moon at night. whether going or coming– from now until forever from now.
My help comes from the LORD ,
God won"t let your foot slip.
The sun won"t strike you during the day;
The LORD will protect you from all evil; God will protect your very life.
The LORD will protect you on your journeys–

122.verse_text: I rejoiced with those who said to me, 'Let"s go to the LORD "s house!' in your gates, Jerusalem! joined together in unity. the LORD "s tribes! It is the law for Israel to give thanks there to the LORD "s name, the thrones of the house of David! 'Let those who love you have rest. let there be rest on your fortifications.' I say, 'Peace be with you, Jerusalem.' I will pray for your good.
Jerusalem is built like a city
That is where the tribes go up–
because the thrones of justice are there–
Let there be peace on your walls;
For the sake of my family and friends,
For the sake of the LORD our God"s house

123.verse_text: I raise my eyes to you– you who rule heaven. just as the eyes of a female servant attend to her mistress" hand– that"s how our eyes attend to the LORD our God until he has mercy on us. because we"ve had more than enough shame. more than enough shame from the proud.
Just as the eyes of servants attend to their masters" hand,
Have mercy on us, LORD ! Have mercy
We"ve had more than enough mockery from the self-confident,

124.verse_text: If the LORD hadn"t been for us– let Israel now repeat!– when those people attacked us with their rage burning against us! because he didn"t hand us over like food for our enemies" teeth! the trap was broken so we escaped! the maker of heaven and earth.
if the LORD hadn"t been for us,
then they would have swallowed us up whole
Then the waters would have drowned us; the torrent would have come over our necks;
then the raging waters would have come over our necks!
We escaped like a bird from the hunters" trap;
Our help is in the name of the LORD ,

125.verse_text: The people who trust in the LORD are like Mount Zion: never shaken, lasting forever. That"s how the LORD surrounds his people from now until forever from now! in the land given to the righteous to people whose hearts are right. may the LORD march them off with other evildoers! Peace be on Israel!
The wicked rod won"t remain so that they don"t use their hands to do anything wrong.
LORD , do good to people who are good,
But as for those people who turn to their own twisted ways–

126.verse_text: When the LORD changed Zion"s circumstances for the better, it was like we had been dreaming. our tongues were filled with joyful shouts. It was even said, at that time, among the nations, 'The LORD has done great things for them!' and we are overjoyed. like dry streams in the desert waste! reap the harvest with joyful shouts. crying and carrying their seed, come home with joyful shouts, carrying bales of grain!
Our mouths were suddenly filled with laughter;
Yes, the LORD has done great things for us,
LORD , change our circumstances for the better,
Let those who plant with tears

127.verse_text: Unless it is the LORD who builds the house, the builders" work is pointless. Unless it is the LORD who protects the city, the guard on duty is pointless. eating the bread of hard labor because God gives sleep to those he loves. the fruit of the womb is a divine reward. are like arrows in the hand of a warrior. They won"t be ashamed when arguing with their enemies in the gate.
It is pointless that you get up early and stay up late,
No doubt about it: children are a gift from the LORD ;
The children born when one is young
The person who fills a quiver full with them is truly happy!

128.verse_text: Everyone who honors the LORD , who walks in God"s ways, is truly happy! you"ll be happy; and things will go well for you. All around your table, your children will be like olive trees, freshly planted. they will be blessed! May you experience Jerusalem"s goodness your whole life long. Peace be on Israel!
You will definitely enjoy what you"ve worked hard for–
In your house, your wife will be like a vine full of fruit.
That"s how it goes for anyone who honors the LORD :
May the LORD bless you from Zion.
And may you see your grandchildren.

129.verse_text: From youth, people have constantly attacked me– let Israel now repeat!– but they haven"t beaten me! they made their furrows deep. God cut me free from the ropes of the wicked! that dies before it can be pulled up, or fill the harvester"s arms. 'May the LORD "s blessing be on you! We bless you in the LORD "s name!'
from youth people have constantly attacked me–
They plowed my back like farmers;
Let everyone who hates Zion be ashamed, thoroughly frustrated.
Let them be like grass on a roof
which won"t fill the reaper"s hand
Let no one who passes by say to them:

130.verse_text: I cry out to you from the depths, LORD – Let your ears pay close attention to my request for mercy! my Lord, who would stand a chance? that"s why you are honored. and I wait for God"s promise. more than the night watch waits for morning; yes, more than the night watch waits for morning! Because faithful love is with the LORD ; because great redemption is with our God! from all its sin.
my Lord, listen to my voice!
If you kept track of sins, LORD –
I hope, LORD . My whole being hopes,
My whole being waits for my Lord–
He is the one who will redeem Israel

131.verse_text: LORD , my heart isn"t proud; my eyes aren"t conceited. I don"t get involved with things too great or wonderful for me. like a weaned child on its mother; I"m like the weaned child that is with me. from now until forever from now!
No. But I have calmed and quieted myself

132.verse_text: LORD , remember David– all the ways he suffered how he promised the strong one of Jacob: won"t get into my bed. won"t let my eyelids sleep, a dwelling place for the strong one of Jacob.' let"s worship at the place God rests his feet! you and your powerful covenant chest! let your faithful shout out with joy! do not reject your anointed one. a true promise that God won"t take back: 'I will put one of your own children on your throne. and the laws that I will teach them, then their children too will rule on your throne forever.' he wanted it for his home. I will fill its needy full of food! and its faithful will shout out loud with joy! I will prepare a lamp for my anointed one there. but the crown he wears will shine.'
and how he swore to the LORD ,
I won"t let my eyes close,
until I find a place for the LORD ,
Yes, we heard about it in Ephrathah; we found it in the fields of Jaar. I will live here because I wanted it for myself.
Get up, LORD , go to your residence–
Let your priests be dressed in righteousness;
And for the sake of your servant David,
And if your children keep my covenant
I will most certainly bless its food supply;
I will dress its priests in salvation,
It is there that I will make David"s strength thrive.
I will dress his enemies in shame,

133.verse_text: Look at how good and pleasing it is when families live together as one! running down onto the beard– Aaron"s beard!– which extended over the collar of his robes. streaming down onto the mountains of Zion, because it is there that the LORD has commanded the blessing: everlasting life.
It is like expensive oil poured over the head,
It is like the dew on Mount Hermon

134.verse_text: All you who serve the LORD : bless the LORD right now! All you who minister in the LORD "s house at night: bless God! and bless the LORD ! bless you from Zion.
Lift up your hands to the sanctuary
May the LORD , the maker of heaven and earth,

135.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Praise the LORD "s name! All you who serve the LORD , praise God! who stand in the courtyards of our God"s temple– Sing praises to God"s name because it is beautiful! God chose Israel as his treasured possession. I know our Lord is greater than all other gods. in heaven or on earth, in the seas and in every ocean depth. God makes lightning for the rain. God releases the wind from its storeroom. both human and animal! against Pharaoh and all his servants. and killed mighty kings: Og the king of Bashan, and all the Canaanite kings. as an inheritance to Israel, his own people. LORD , your fame extends from one generation to the next! and has compassion on those who serve him. things made by human hands. They have eyes, but they can"t see. No, there"s no breath in their lungs! and all who trust in them become just like them! House of Aaron, bless the LORD ! You who honor the LORD , bless the LORD ! bless the one who lives in Jerusalem! Praise the LORD !
All you who stand in the LORD "s house–
praise the LORD , because the LORD is good!
Because the LORD chose Jacob as his own,
Yes, I know for certain that the LORD is great–
The LORD can do whatever he wants
God forms clouds at the far corners of the earth.
God struck down the Egyptians" oldest offspring–
God sent signs and wonders into the very center of Egypt–
God struck down many nations
Sihon the Amorite king,
Then God handed their land over as an inheritance–
LORD , your name is forever!
The LORD gives justice to his people
The nations" idols are just silver and gold–
They have mouths, but they can"t speak.
They have ears, but they can"t listen.
Let the people who made these idols
House of Israel, bless the LORD !
House of Levi, bless the LORD !
Bless the LORD from Zion–

136.verse_text: Give thanks to the LORD because he is good. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. who makes great wonders– God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever. God"s faithful love lasts forever! God"s faithful love lasts forever!
Give thanks to the God of all gods–
Give thanks to the Lord of all lords–
Give thanks to the only one
Give thanks to the one who made the skies with skill–
Give thanks to the one who shaped the earth on the water–
Give thanks to the one who made the great lights–
The sun to rule the day–
The moon and the stars to rule the night–
Give thanks to the one who struck down the Egyptians" oldest offspring–
Give thanks to the one who brought Israel out of there–
With a strong hand and outstretched arm–
Give thanks to the one who split the Reed Sea in two–
Give thanks to the one who brought Israel through–
And tossed Pharaoh and his army into the Reed Sea–
Give thanks to the one who led his people through the desert–
Give thanks to the one who struck down great kings–
And killed powerful kings–
Sihon, the Amorite king–
Og, king of Bashan–
Handing their land over as an inheritance–
As an inheritance to Israel, his servant–
God remembered us when we were humiliated–
God rescued us from our enemies–
God is the one who provides food for all living things–
Give thanks to the God of heaven–

137.verse_text: Alongside Babylon"s streams, there we sat down, crying because we remembered Zion. in the trees there our tormentors requested songs of joy: 'Sing us a song about Zion!' they said. the LORD "s song on foreign soil? let my strong hand wither! if I don"t remember you, if I don"t make Jerusalem my greatest joy. on Jerusalem"s dark day: 'Rip it down, rip it down! All the way to its foundations!' they yelled. a blessing on the one who pays you back the very deed you did to us! and smashes them against the rock!
because that"s where our captors asked us to sing;
But how could we possibly sing
Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth
LORD , remember what the Edomites did
A blessing on the one who seizes your children

138.verse_text: I give thanks to you with all my heart, LORD . I sing your praise before all other gods. and thank your name for your loyal love and faithfulness because you have made your name and word when they hear what you say. because the LORD "s glory is so great! he can still see the lowly, but God keeps his distance from the arrogant. you make me live again; you send your power against my enemies" wrath; you save me with your strong hand. Your faithful love lasts forever, LORD ! Don"t let go of what your hands have made.
I bow toward your holy temple greater than everything else. You encouraged me with inner strength.
On the day I cried out, you answered me.
Let all the earth"s rulers give thanks to you, LORD ,
Let them sing about the LORD "s ways
Even though the LORD is high,
Whenever I am in deep trouble,
The LORD will do all this for my sake.

139.verse_text: LORD , you have examined me. You know me. Even from far away, you comprehend my plans. You are thoroughly familiar with all my ways. that you don"t already know completely. You put your hand on me. it"s so high above me that I can"t reach it. Where could I go to escape your presence? stopping to rest only on the far side of the ocean– even there your strong hand would hold me tight! the light will become night around me,' Nighttime would shine bright as day, because darkness is the same as light to you! you knit me together while I was still in my mother"s womb. Your works are wonderful–I know that very well. when I was being put together in a secret place, when I was being woven together in the deep parts of the earth. Their total number is countless! If only murderers would get away from me– the people who are your enemies, Don"t I despise those who attack you? They"ve become my enemies too. Put me to the test! Know my anxious thoughts! then lead me on the eternal path!
You know when I sit down and when I stand up.
You study my traveling and resting.
There isn"t a word on my tongue, LORD ,
You surround me–front and back.
That kind of knowledge is too much for me;
Where could I go to get away from your spirit?

If I went up to heaven, you would be there. If I went down to the grave, you would be there too! and on your scroll every day was written that was being formed for me, before any one of them had yet happened. If I came to the very end–I"d still be with you. who use your name as if it were of no significance.
If I could fly on the wings of dawn,
even there your hand would guide me;
If I said, 'The darkness will definitely hide me;
even then the darkness isn"t too dark for you!
You are the one who created my innermost parts;
I give thanks to you that I was marvelously set apart.
My bones weren"t hidden from you
Your eyes saw my embryo,
God, your plans are incomprehensible to me!
If I tried to count them–they outnumber grains of sand!
If only, God, you would kill the wicked!
the people who talk about you, but only for wicked schemes;
Don"t I hate everyone who hates you?
Yes, I hate them–through and through!
Examine me, God! Look at my heart!
Look to see if there is any idolatrous way in me,

140.verse_text: Rescue me from evil people, LORD ! Guard me from violent people who pick fights every single day! Guard me from violent people who plot to trip me up! They"ve spread out a net alongside the road. They"ve set snares for me. Selah Listen to my request for mercy, LORD !' you"ve protected my head on the day of battle. Don"t allow their plans to succeed, Let them fall into deep pits and never get out again! and will do what is right for the needy. and those who do right will live in your presence.
who plot evil things in their hearts,

They sharpen their tongues like a snake"s; spider poison is on their lips. Selah or they"ll exalt themselves even more! Selah be covered with the trouble their own lips caused! Let calamity hunt down violent people–and quickly!
Protect me from the power of the wicked, LORD !
Arrogant people have laid a trap for me with ropes.
I tell the LORD , 'You are my God!
My LORD God, my strong saving help–
LORD , don"t give the wicked what they want!
Let the heads of the people surrounding me
Let burning coals fall on them!
Let no slanderer be safe in the land.
I know that the LORD will take up the case of the poor
Yes, the righteous will give thanks to your name,

141.verse_text: I cry out to you, LORD : Come to me–quickly! Listen to my voice when I cry out to you! let my uplifted hands be like the evening offering. keep close watch over the door that is my lips. so that I don"t do wicked things with evildoers, so I don"t taste their delicacies. let the faithful correct me! Let my head never reject that kind of fine oil, I take refuge in you; don"t let me die! protect me from the snares of the evildoers. but let me make it through safely.
Let my prayer stand before you like incense;
Set a guard over my mouth, LORD ;
Don"t let my heart turn aside to evil things

Instead, let the righteous discipline me; because my prayers are always against the deeds of the wicked. but my words will be heard because they are pleasing. just like when the ground is broken up and plowed.
Their leaders will fall from jagged cliffs,
Our bones have been scattered at the mouth of the grave,
But my eyes are on you, my LORD God.
Protect me from the trap they"ve set for me;
Let the wicked fall into their own nets–all together!–

142.verse_text: I cry out loud for help from the LORD . I beg out loud for mercy from the LORD . I announce my distress to him. But they"ve hidden a trap for me in the path I"m taking. No one pays attention to me. There"s no escape for me. No one cares about my life. 'You are my refuge,' I say. 'You are all I have in the land of the living.' because I"ve been brought down so low! Deliver me from my oppressors because they"re stronger than me. so I can give thanks to your name. Then the righteous will gather all around me because of your good deeds to me.
I pour out my concerns before God;
When my spirit is weak inside me, you still know my way.
I cry to you, LORD , for help.
Pay close attention to my shouting,
Get me out of this prison

143.verse_text: Listen to my prayer, LORD ! Because of your faithfulness, hear my requests for mercy! Because of your righteousness, answer me! because no living thing is righteous before you. crushing my life in the dirt, forcing me to live in the dark like those who"ve been dead forever. inside, my mind is numb. I meditate on all your deeds; I contemplate your handiwork. Don"t hide your face from me or I"ll be like those going down to the pit! because I trust you. Show me the way I should go, because I offer my life up to you. because you are my God. Guide me by your good spirit into good land. Bring me out of distress because of your righteousness. Destroy everyone who attacks me, because I am your servant.
Please don"t bring your servant to judgment,
My spirit is weak inside me–
I remember the days long past;
I stretch out my hands to you; my whole being is like dry dirt, thirsting for you. Selah I seek protection from you.
Answer me, LORD –and quickly! My breath is fading.
Tell me all about your faithful love come morning time,
Deliver me from my enemies, LORD !
Teach me to do what pleases you,
Make me live again, LORD , for your name"s sake.
Wipe out my enemies because of your faithful love.

144.verse_text: Bless the LORD , my rock, who taught my hands how to fight, who taught my fingers how to do battle! my place of safety, my rescuer, my shield, in whom I take refuge, and the one who subdues people before me. What are human beings that you even consider them? their days go by like a shadow. Touch the mountains so they smoke! Shoot your arrows and defeat them! Rescue me and deliver me from deep water, from the power of strangers, whose mouths speak lies, I will sing praises to you on a ten-stringed harp, and who rescues his servant David from the evil sword. whose mouths speak lies, and whose strong hand is a strong hand of deception, so that our daughters can be like pillars carved to decorate a palace; so that our flocks can be in the thousands– even tens of thousands–in our fields; so that there won"t be any breach in the walls, no exile, no outcries in our streets! The people whose God is the LORD are truly happy!
God is my loyal one, my fortress,
What are human beings, LORD , that you know them at all?
Humans are like a puff of air;
LORD , part your skies and come down!
Flash lightning and scatter the enemy!
Stretch out your hand from above!
and whose strong hand is a strong hand of deception!
I will sing a new song to you, God.
to you–the one who gives saving help to rulers,
Rescue me and deliver me from the power of strangers,
so that our sons can grow up fully, in their youth, like plants;
so that our barns can be full, providing all kinds of food;
so that our cattle can be loaded with calves;
The people who have it like this are truly happy!

145.verse_text: I will lift you up high, my God, the true king. I will bless your name forever and always. I will praise your name forever and always. God"s greatness can"t be grasped. proclaiming your mighty acts. I will contemplate your wondrous works. I will declare your great accomplishments. they will shout joyfully about your righteousness: very patient, and full of faithful love. God"s compassion extends to all his handiwork!' all your faithful ones bless you! they talk all about your power, and the majestic glory of God"s kingdom. your rule endures for all generations. The LORD is trustworthy in all that he says, straightens up all who are bent low. and you give them their food right on time, and satisfying the desire of every living thing. faithful in all his deeds. to all who call out to him sincerely. listening to their cries for help and saving them. but he destroys every wicked person. and every living thing will bless God"s holy name forever and always.
I will bless you every day.
The LORD is great and so worthy of praise!
One generation will praise your works to the next one,
They will talk all about the glorious splendor of your majesty;
They will speak of the power of your awesome deeds;
They will rave in celebration of your abundant goodness;
'The LORD is merciful and compassionate,
The LORD is good to everyone and everything;
All that you have made gives thanks to you, LORD ;
They speak of the glory of your kingdom;
to inform all human beings about God"s power
Your kingdom is a kingship that lasts forever; faithful in all that he does.
The LORD supports all who fall down,
All eyes look to you, hoping,
opening your hand
The LORD is righteous in all his ways,
The LORD is close to everyone who calls out to him,
God shows favor to those who honor him,
The LORD protects all who love him,
My mouth will proclaim the LORD "s praise,

146.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Let my whole being praise the LORD ! I will sing praises to my God as long as I live. don"t trust any human beings– there"s no saving help with them! then they go back to the ground. On that very same day, their plans die too. the person whose hope rests on the LORD their God– is truly happy! the sea, and all that is in them, God: who is faithful forever, who gives bread to people who are starving! The LORD : who frees prisoners. The LORD : who straightens up those who are bent low. The LORD : who loves the righteous. who helps orphans and widows, but who makes the way of the wicked twist and turn! Zion, your God will rule from one generation to the next! Praise the LORD !
I will praise the LORD with all my life;
The person whose help is the God of Jacob–
God: the maker of heaven and earth,
who gives justice to people who are oppressed,
The LORD : who makes the blind see.

147.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Because it is good to sing praise to our God! Because it is a pleasure to make beautiful praise! and bandages their wounds. giving each one a name. God"s knowledge can"t be grasped! but throws the wicked down on the dirt! sing praises to our God with a lyre! God makes rain for the earth; God makes the mountains sprout green grass. even to the baby ravens when they cry out. God doesn"t treasure the legs of a runner. who honor him, the people who wait for his faithful love. Praise your God, Zion! God blesses the children you have there. God fills you full with the very best wheat. God"s word speeds off fast! God scatters frost like it was ashes; who can endure God"s freezing cold? God makes his winds blow; the water flows again. his statutes and rules to Israel. Praise the LORD !
The LORD rebuilds Jerusalem, gathering up Israel"s exiles.
God heals the brokenhearted
God counts the stars by number,
Our Lord is great and so strong!
The LORD helps the poor,
Sing to the LORD with thanks;
God covers the skies with clouds;
God gives food to the animals–
God doesn"t prize the strength of a horse;
No. The LORD treasures the people
Worship the LORD , Jerusalem!
Because God secures the bars on your gates,
God establishes your borders peacefully.
God issues his command to the earth–
God spreads snow like it was wool;
God throws his hail down like crumbs–
Then God issues his word and melts it all away!
God proclaims his word to Jacob;
God hasn"t done that with any other nation; those nations have no knowledge of God"s rules.

148.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Praise the LORD from heaven! Praise God on the heights! Praise God, all of you who comprise his heavenly forces! All of you bright stars, praise God! Do the same, you waters that are above the sky! because God gave the command and they were created! God made a law that will not be broken. you sea monsters and all you ocean depths! stormy wind that does what God says! fruit trees, and every single cedar! you creatures that creep along and you birds that fly! you princes and every single ruler on earth! you who are old together with you who are young! because only God"s name is high over all. Only God"s majesty is over earth and heaven. the praise of all his faithful ones– that"s the Israelites, the people who are close to him. Praise the LORD !
Praise God, all of you who are his messengers!
Let all of these praise the LORD "s name
God set them in place always and forever.
Praise the LORD from the earth,
Do the same, fire and hail, snow and smoke,
Do the same, you mountains, every single hill,
Do the same, you animals–wild or tame–
Do the same, you kings of the earth and every single person,
Do the same, you young men–young women too!–
Let all of these praise the LORD "s name
God raised the strength of his people,

149.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Sing to the LORD a new song; sing God"s praise in the assembly of the faithful! let Zion"s children rejoice in their king! let them sing God"s praise with the drum and lyre! God will beautify the poor with saving help. and a double-edged sword in their hands, and punishment on the peoples, and their officials in iron shackles, written against them. That will be an honor for all God"s faithful people. Praise the LORD !
Let them praise God"s name with dance;
Because the LORD is pleased with his people,
Let the faithful celebrate with glory; let them shout for joy on their beds.
Let the high praises of God be in their mouths
to get revenge against the nations

150.verse_text: Praise the LORD ! Praise God in his sanctuary! Praise God in his fortress, the sky! Praise God as suits his incredible greatness! Praise God with lute and lyre! Praise God with strings and pipe! Praise God with clashing cymbals! Praise the LORD !
Praise God in his mighty acts!
Praise God with the blast of the ram"s horn!
Praise God with drum and dance!
Let every living thing praise the LORD !
